auth.loginDescription: Welcome back. Enter your email and password, let's hope you remember them this time.
auth.branchAdminLoginDescription: Enter your credentials to access the branch admin dashboard
auth.franchiseLoginDescription: Enter your credentials to access your franchise dashboard
auth.contactAdmin: Contact your system administrator to get started with our car care management solution.
auth.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.confirmPasswordMinLength: Confirm Password must be at least 6 characters.
auth.registerDescription: Fill in your details below. We promise not to quiz you about your first pet's name (this time).
auth.joinOurPlatform: Join our professional car care platform
auth.ecoFriendlySolutions: Experience the finest car care with our eco-friendly cleaning solutions.
auth.supportDescription: Our team is always ready to help you with any car care needs.

dashboard.title: Karwi Admin Dashboard

branches.title: Branches
branches.description: Manage all Karwi branches and their services
branches.editDescription: Update the details of the branch.
branches.addDescription: Add a new branch to your system.

deleteConfirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the branch and all its data.

franchises.title: Franchises
franchises.description: Manage all Karwi franchises and their branches
franchises.editDescription: Update the details of the franchise.
franchises.addDescription: Add a new franchise to your system.
franchises.note: Note: The franchise admin will need to confirm their email address after creation. They will receive a verification email.

deleteConfirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the franchise and all its data.

users.title: Users
users.description: Manage all Karwi users and their booking history
users.editDescription: Update the details of the user.

deleteConfirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the user and all their data.

washers.title: Washers
washers.description: Manage all Karwi washers and their assignments

washers.addDescription: Add a new washer to your system.

deleteConfirm.title: Are you absolutely sure?
deleteConfirm.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the washer and all their data.
